channel.title: Operating ring need help

item.title: Operating ring need help
item.dc:creator: @pzykow pzykow
item.description:
@pzykow wrote:

This is the code of my ring that I wanna use,
So far if you operate you only see GFX and animation but I want it to boost your combat stats up to 125.
Like if you would drink super strength potion it boosts to 118.

   public void handleCruel() {
      if(c.isDonator == 1){
      if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.dfsDelay > 120000) {
         if (c.playerIndex > 0 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex] != null) {
            c.startAnimation(265);
            c.gfx0(265);
            c.dfsDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();               
         }
      } else {
         c.sendMessage("My ring hasn't finished recharging yet (60 Seconds)");
         }if (c.isDonator == 0)
         c.sendMessage("Only Donators can use the ring's Special attack");
   }
}

Read full topic
